title: Update header logo to use newly generated optimized PNG asset

requirements.summary: Generate and serve the new round-cropped transparent logo PNG and ensure the site header uses it on desktop and mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: A new optimized logo image exists at "frontend/public/assets/generated/school-logo-uploaded.dim_512x512.png" (512x512, transparent background, round-cropped).
The site header renders the updated logo using src="/assets/generated/school-logo-uploaded.dim_512x512.png" and it is visible on both desktop and mobile navigation.
No backend changes are required for this logo replacement.

file_operations.description: Replace/create the optimized, round-cropped, transparent PNG (512x512) derived from "Logo HD round cropped-1.jpeg" at this exact path so it is served as a static asset from public.

Ensure the header logo uses src="/assets/generated/school-logo-uploaded.dim_512x512.png" (and remains rendered in the sticky header across desktop and mobile) without introducing any non-logo branding/layout changes.
